"A.P.238/2/20/11:30": "Wh-what's going on?"
"Emergency notice for all ARKS! Code D has been put into effect on Naberius! Photon levels are critical!"
"I repeat, Code D is in effect on Naberius!"
"Spatial erosion has been observed!"
"P-partner! Look!"
"This can't be happening... These black things are just appearing out of nowhere..."
"Darker appearance confirmed! Activity has exceeded acceptable levels!"
"This is a top priority order for all ARKS! Destroy the Darkers immediately!"
"These... are Darkers? The enemy of ARKS? It's said they destroy and consume everything in their path."
"What the heck? These things aren't supposed to be on Naberius!"
"...That was a close call. It's a good thing I was nearby."
"Did you come to rescue us? Thank goodness, we're saved!"
"We're not out of the woods yet. Come on, the rendezvous point is just up ahead. Let's push on through!"
"Wh-what? You expect us to fight our way there?"
"You're ARKS, right? Of course I expect you to fight. At least your partner looks ready, even if you aren't."
"Hey... Partner... Yeah, I know, I know... We just have to do it, right?"
"For a new recruit, you sure are calm. You've got potential... Wait, excuse me but..."
"I swear I've seen your face before somewhere..."
"No matter, I'll worry about that later. Let's get a move on. Try to keep up, rookies!"
"The day I was waiting for"
"Prologue: The Long-Awaited Day"
